name: Starlight Explorers
description:
Chart a course for adventure in this lighthearted, all-ages physics sim that will take you to the stars.

You're Rook, the newest member of the team of Starlight Explorers charting the galaxy and collecting information about planets you pass. Play in three different modes to explore the universe!

  • Learn about your fellow crew-members in story mode.
  • Refine mechanics in practice mode.
  • Show off your skills in expeditions, a long-hauler explorer mode that will challenge you to visit each target location before running out of probes.

Fun for the whole family: kids get a friendly introduction to gravitational principles; adults get to flex their nav skills. Everyone can set up wild skill shots--then lean back and watch in first-person mode as the galaxy soars by.
